participant_2.background:
I'm more concerned with my character than my appearance.
I frequently drink chocolate milk, which is not very good for my weight.
i recently had a private lunch with will ferrell.
I enjoy playing with my parakeet and going for walks to help keep me active.
I'd brag about the fact that I'm still close to my friends despite all the fame.

content.text: I recently had a private lunch with Will Ferrell.
That's awesome! What was that like?
It was so cool! He's exactly how you would expect him to be. So funny and down to earth.
I've always wanted to meet him. He's one of my favorite comedians.
He's really great. I'm glad I got to meet him.
We talked about a lot of things. We talked about his new movie, his family, and just random stuff. He's a really great guy.
I can imagine. I'm so jealous!
I'm glad I could share that with you.
Thanks! What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time outdoors, especially on my property. I have a big garden and I love to work on it. I also like to go for walks in the woods.
That sounds really nice. I love being outdoors too. I have a parakeet and I love to play with him.
Parakeets are so cute! I used to have one when I was a kid.
They're great pets. They're so friendly and they always make me laugh.
I'm glad you like him. I'm sure you're a great pet owner.
Well, it's been nice talking to you. I have to go now, but I hope we can talk again soon.
It was nice talking to you too. Have a good day!
